channel.title: 12 beers of Christmas 2020 on Drinktober 2020
channel.description: Recent content in 12 beers of Christmas 2020 on Drinktober 2020

item.title: Say Merry Christmas to my little friend!
Beer we go again
item.description: Well, here we are again, back between the bottle and the glue gun for a festive Drinktober special edition. When Heidi’s not engaged in alcohol free antics, she also rules over Hull LGBT+ Community Pride, AKA Pride in Hull with her tiny iron fist - or something along those lines anyway! So when she mentioned raising funds for their 2021 event I jumped at the opportunity to drink beer and show off :)
